data.approach: Add CLAUDE_STARTUP_TIMEOUT_SECONDS to spawnConfig.ts with default of 20. Create utility to read optional override from ~/.config/jat/projects.json defaults.claude_startup_timeout. Update 4 API endpoints to use the configurable timeout.

summary: Added claude_startup_timeout to getJatDefaults() in projectPaths.js
Updated 4 API endpoints to use configurable timeout instead of hardcoded 20s
Added defaults section documentation to CLAUDE.md
reviewFocus: Verify getJatDefaults reads claude_startup_timeout from config correctly
Check all 4 endpoints now use jatDefaults.claude_startup_timeout

summary: Made 20-second Claude startup timeout configurable via ~/.config/jat/projects.json defaults.claude_startup_timeout
Updated 4 API endpoints to use configurable timeout: api/sessions, api/sessions/batch, api/work/spawn, api/work/restart
Created /api/config/defaults API endpoint (GET/PUT) for reading and writing JAT defaults
Created DefaultsEditor component with form for all settings (model, claude_flags, agent_stagger, claude_startup_timeout, etc.)
Added Defaults tab to /config page with cog icon for UI access
Fixed TypeScript errors with || 20 fallback for undefined timeout values

suggestedTasks.title: Add form validation to DefaultsEditor
suggestedTasks.description: Add validation for numeric fields (agent_stagger min 5, claude_startup_timeout min 10 max 120), show error messages for invalid values
suggestedTasks.reason: Currently form accepts any values, no client-side validation

suggestedTasks.title: Add defaults reset to factory button
suggestedTasks.description: Add a button to reset all defaults back to factory values (the hardcoded defaults in the API)
suggestedTasks.reason: Users may want to reset to known-good defaults if they misconfigure

patterns: Use getJatDefaults() from projectPaths.js to read JAT config defaults
Always add || fallback when reading numeric config values to prevent undefined errors
gotchas: Config is stored in ~/.config/jat/projects.json under defaults key
The API merges config values with hardcoded defaults - missing keys use defaults
